SASS

Creating website with SASS

The project was completed in the Front End Web Development Certificate Program. For this class project, I had to create three webpages that would show all of the SASS capabilities.

I created a website for a fictitious company advertising tours to Mexico. All the photos used in this project were taken by me during my trips to Mexico.

GitHub repository for this project: here
Link for website: here

----------

SassScript (.sass and .scss) extends the CSS syntax, adding nesting rules, variables, mixins, partials, conditionals, selector inheritance, calculation, _referensing parent selectors with &, using @extand method to create shadow class to avoid the selector name repeating and so on.

----------

In this project, I utilized math operations, color modification, list element, @content container use, condition @if statement & argument lists, looping list @for, @each, and map data type.

Using the math operations you can easily make image grids. Using the @content container you can create media queries more efficiently.

Modifying colors was the part that I was most interested in this project. There are many ways to style colors, for example, opacity, transparentize, darken, etc.

Looping list(@for, @each) is a very efficient way to work with iterating lists.

----------

You can find following functionality of the Sass in my code:
* Variables section (_variables.scss )
* Math Operator ( _mixin.css, line 38 )
* Color modifier (_navigation.scss, lines 3, 63; _tables.scss, lines 19, 27, 37, 46)
* List properties ( _interface.scss, line 5 )
* Map (interface.scss, lines 50-64 )
* 'Flow Content' item (_interface.scss, line 27 and 57 )
* Custom mixin ( _mixins.scss, all lines )
* Extend (interface.scss , line 60)
* Nesting ( _mixin.scss, line 58 to 71 and many others)
* Built-in Sass functions ( _tables.scss, lines 2, 20, 28, 38, 47; _background.scss, line 14)
* If/else statment (_mixin.scss, line 60 to 71)

----------

During this project, I gained a deeper appreciation for Sass. Sass is extremely effective in a work environment for a medium or large scale website. It is essential for successful website development and maintenance.
